name: Moonworkers
slogan: An HR software for the creative industries
description: Moonworkers is a unified solution of HR management tools built for the Creative industries who employ a flexible workforce. It includes an integrated set of products that let you manage your entire HR lifecycle without needing core HR knowledge.

jobs.title: Outbound Sales Representative
jobs.description:
We are seeking highly motivated individuals to grow with our company. As an Outbound Sales Representative, you will interact with Moonworkers’ prospects to introduce them to products and services that meet their needs. You’ll be key in ensuring our HBD has enough leads to keep him busy and to keep us driving towards our company targets.

Requirements:

- Bachelor's degree
- A minimum of 1 year of outbound sales experience, particularly in a bonus or commission-based sales environment, is preferred.
- Excellent written and oral communication
- Great pitching skills
- Excellent customer service, listening and time management skills
- Collaborative mindset
- Ability to learn/understand and articulate our solution sets and value propositions
- Individual that is passionate about SaaS, Customer Service, and High Tech.
- Confident, calm and collected nature
- Growth mindset; not afraid to try new approaches, turning mistakes or failures into a learning opportunity


Responsibilities:

- Contact prospective customers by both telephone and email
- Generate new business opportunities to fuel our Sales pipeline.
- Report into our Head of Business Development to develop target lists, call strategies, and messaging to drive opportunities for new business.
- Conduct high-level conversations with Senior Executives in target accounts.
- Research and build new and existing accounts (i.e. adding contacts, sending regular emails, and qualifying opportunities into the Sales pipeline).
- Use our CRM to track progress with new prospects
- Achieve or exceed monthly quotas of qualified opportunities
